name: Tevris
description: Classic tetromino game in VR. One of the most awaited puzzle classics to be played with motion controls. Cute blocks, vivid colors, high scores, MEGA-mode and more to come.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: i5-4400, equivalent or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 770, equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: VR headset required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
